website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable mattress by a popular manufacturer that provides innovative cooling technology for restorative sleep.
pros: Made with the brand's proprietary cooling material that feels cool to the touch and absorbs heat from the body
cons: If you aren't use to sleeping on a very firm mattress, the extra firm option may feel too hard

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift. The recipient reports that she likes it, and that it has had a positive impact on her back and general well-being upon waking in the morning. She reports that everything went well with the delivery and un-packing - no issues whatsoever (no reports of fumes or being misshapened). She has had this for two months so far. Will try to check back after a longer time to report how it is working out long-term, and may adjust "stars" accordingly - since I think it is still too early to tell, I am reluctant to give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Eyesk

customer_reviews.title: I can NOT say enough good things about this mattress
customer_reviews.text: I can NOT say enough good things about this mattress! I have 2 out-of-the-box mattresses. The cocoon is for people who like more support/a little firmer mattress. My back feels great when I wake up.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Mccabe

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second cocoon that I have bought personally. I have also talked two different people into buying one and they both love theirs also. I’ve got nothing but good things to say about the mattress. If it’s good enough for Oprah‘s Favorite Things, it’s good enough for me!
customer_reviews.author: Gilioid

customer_reviews.title: bed in a box
customer_reviews.text: my first bed in a box. considered some cheaper ones like zinus but ended up getting this. good packaging, but also easy to unwrap. bed 'inflated' in less than 30 minutes. very comfortable and soft (i got the soft one).
customer_reviews.author: gookie

customer_reviews.title: Not NEW!
customer_reviews.text: I had gotten one of these before, wanted a queen size this time, came in clearly USED not NEW as described, wasn't even shipped in the box just rerapped and dirty, clearly showing it has been used, letting it air up now.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Funnell

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy
customer_reviews.text: Bought a full size mattress for my 4 yrs old. Mattress came in a simply black box. Easy to get out and open. Once opened and on the bed, the mattress sprung to life. It does have a chemical smell which we hope would dissipate in a day or so. The mattress is firm but soft. My toddler loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kh177ergurl

customer_reviews.title: Huge Value
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be more happy with this non-traditional mattress. It is awesome. And knowing that I didn't spend $3,000 to get this level of comfort makes me sleep even better.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Glad we bought these.
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our adjustable bed mattresses with two of these. So glad we chose them. Very comfortable and work perfectly with our bases. The soft was the right choice for us.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert K.

customer_reviews.title: Fast Rising.
customer_reviews.text: Love this mattress! It only took 5 minutes to inflate to a full size.It slips a little easily on my platform frame. I did have a problem with shipping but Amazon quickly resolved it and discounted me for my time.
customer_reviews.author: Kimi Crum

customer_reviews.title: Old mattress in a box. Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Receive the mattress no problem. Super fast shipping. However the mattress was over two years old sitting in a box on the shelf somewhere. The mattress never would fully in flight to the proper height. Never got a chance to use her sleep on it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Kelly

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FIT!
customer_reviews.text: Size is perfect for fit, soft and comfortable. Works great with electronic beds that raise up and down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sent the wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a king. The box arrived and was labeled "king size" but the actual mattress ended up only being a full size. Amazon was kind enough to refund my money despite not being able to take it back (because it was opened and expanded).
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous bed
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bed!!! Order the soft if you like a firmer mattress
customer_reviews.author: Roy S.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's too firm even tho I got the soft one.
customer_reviews.author: vince

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Got the firm version. It's soft yet firm. Feels great! Well packaged and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Too soft after 3 years
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this mattress less than 3 years ago and I woke up with severe back throughout the night and every morning. Over the past 3 years, it became began sinking in the center. This provided little back support. I've had a few memory foam mattresses. This was the worst of them.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress ever!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my college age son, and he says it's the best mattress he's ever slept on in his life. It arrived in a much smaller box than expected (although very heavy) but expanded quickly. There was no strange smell. He never gets hot when sleeping, the firmness is absolutely perfect, and he sleeps better than ever.. Now I'm considering buying one for my husband and me. Well worth the price tag and highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Bowes

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfy
customer_reviews.text: We have had this king firm cocoon mattress for almost two years. It's very durable holding its shape well. The only negative is it does sleep hot which is the problem with most foam mattresses. Other then that it's been great.
customer_reviews.author: Discover

customer_reviews.title: Careful with sizing
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these mattresses. I loved my first one that is a queen firm. I bought my toddler the full firm. I don't know if it's just the size but whenever I have to sleep with her it's extremely uncomfortable. I think the middle is firm and the sides of the foam mattress have more give to them than a regular mattress. I would recommend only buying the queen. The full size has not been a good purchase for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cocoon is right!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful mattress with a lower and more affordable price point than other brands but with the known Sealy quality that is sooo comfortable and firm while cradling you in your sleep. My grandmother received this item and said she hasn't had any aches or pains since and sleeps like a baby at 80 years old! What wowed us most of all was the packaging; certain we received the wrong item when it arrived, the small box, once opened and cut out of the shrink wrap, blossomed into this HUGE bed literally fit for a queen! Definite restful nights to come for at least a decade or more and worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: NaughtiLiterati

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Mattress
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. Comes in a box, but all you do is unroll it and let it expand. High quality feel, fairly firm that feel soft. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Book Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Easy Set-Up
customer_reviews.text: Sealy makes a better "bed in a box" than other manufacturers- high quality materials and great feel. Arrives in compact box - do not open until you have removed old bedding and have mattress in the area you want as it will never go back to being small again. Once unboxed it will expand quickly, filling out completely in two hours. Those that sleep warm will not need as many blankets.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Love this mattress!!!
customer_reviews.text: This cocoon by Sealy foam mattress is awesome !!!It is very comfortable and has improved my back problems.I had nothing but pain sleeping on my old spring mattress,I would wake up with back pain every morning now I don't.My back feels fine,this is a very comfortable and supportive mattress.I love it !
customer_reviews.author: Firefly

customer_reviews.title: My nine-year-old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My nine-year old is the beneficiary of this Cocoon mattress - and he loves it. In fact, he likes the texture of the mattress so much, we have a hard time getting him to keep sheets on it. He has been sleeping on it for a month now, and has been sleeping great! Less moving around in bed than he used to. I can't ask for better than that!
customer_reviews.author: MagicSkip

customer_reviews.title: NICE!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A FULL MATTRESS IN A BOX. Please note that this is not a topper - but an actual mattress. Isn't too hot and feels great to sleep on. Soft and yet holds you well. This is on slats for us and holds up well! No box spring required.
customer_reviews.author: C. A Scovel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mattress from Sealy
customer_reviews.text: It's a little pricey, but decent mattresses are. That said, this is a very comfy mattress and comes all folded up in a nice cool looking box so you look totally rad carrying it up the stairs. Definitely check it out.
customer_reviews.author: Bookenator

product_meta.title: Cocoon by Sealy Soft Foam, Queen Mattress, White

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars52 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
